name: Seashore Siege
description:
Fight sea creatures and create a sandy defense to protect your sandcastle kingdom!

Seashore Siege is a top-down tower defense game with a unique cast of creatures and towers. Collect sand dollars to purchase and place towers, and try to get the highest score on the leaderboard!

How to Play:

Hover over sand dollars to collect them. Sand dollars are used to purchase towers. Sand hills and chests may spawn, and you can shovel them to collect sand dollars.

Defend your castles!

Your highscore at the end is determined by how long you survived, how many enemies you defeated, and how long your castles survived for. Prioritize castles at all costs!

Controls

Press escape to pause the game and find more information. The player can also RIGHT CLICK to cancel any shovel or tower placements. 

Made in 72 hours for the ScoreSpace jam
